other_tests.findings: Partial removal of a 10-mm pituitary adenoma.
Initially treated with 20 mg every 28 days for 6 months, then increased to 30 mg; no reduction in GH or IGF-I levels and no tumor shrinkage observed.
other_tests.changes_over_time: No modifications of GH and IGF-I levels during treatment, and after 6 months, no shrinkage of the tumor remnant was observed.

other_tests.findings: Cleared reduction of GH and IGF-I levels.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Reduction of GH and IGF-I levels after 6 months at the dose of 3 mg/week.

other_tests.findings: No changes in serum insulin concentrations during treatment.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Serum insulin levels were 5196 /H9262 U/min pre-therapy and 4743 /H9262 U/min during therapy.
